info.title: Promotion Management
info.description: Sellers can set regular or promotional prices for their items. Setting the Promotional prices is an option to create unique pricing for events such as clearance sales or to call out a comparison price

get.description: Retrieves a list of promotional prices for a single SKU.

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: An arbitrary alphanumeric unique ID, specified by the seller, which identifies each item. This will be used by the seller in the XSD file to refer to each item. Special characters in the sku needing encoding are: ':', '/', '?', '#', '[', ']', '@', '!', '$', '&', "'", '(', ')', '*', '+', ',', ';', '=', as well as '%' itself. Other characters don't need to be encoded.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic authorization header. Base 64 encodes the Client ID and Client Secret retrieved in step two of the integration steps.

parameters.name: WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN
parameters.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<ServiceResponse xmlns:ns2="http://walmart.com/">
    <status>OK</status>
    <header/>
    <payload>
        <ns2:itemIdentifier>
            <ns2:sku>97964_KFTest</ns2:sku>
        </ns2:itemIdentifier>
        <ns2:pricingList replaceAll="false">
            <ns2:pricing promoId="ce9dfbce-4043-442c-8cb9-77d39d0f727f" expirationDate="2019-12-03T09:49:57.943Z" effectiveDate="2019-11-03T09:49:57.943Z">
                <ns2:currentPrice>
                    <ns2:value amount="4.00" currency="USD"/>
                </ns2:currentPrice>
                <ns2:currentPriceType>REDUCED</ns2:currentPriceType>
                <ns2:comparisonPrice>
                    <ns2:value amount="4.00" currency="USD"/>
                </ns2:comparisonPrice>
                <ns2:comparisonPriceType>BASE</ns2:comparisonPriceType>
                <ns2:savingsAmount>0.00</ns2:savingsAmount>
                <ns2:savingsPercent>0.00</ns2:savingsPercent>
                <ns2:priceDisplayCodes isClearance="false" isReducedPrice="true" isStrikethrough="true" isRollback="false"/>
            </ns2:pricing>
        </ns2:pricingList>
    </payload>
</ServiceResponse>

put.description:
Updates the promotional price.

Sellers can update or delete an existing promotional price as well as set up a new promotional price.

To set a new promotional price or update an existing one, set the XML pricing attribute processMode to UPSERT.
To delete a promotional price, set the XML pricing attribute processMode to DELETE.
To delete all promotions for a SKU, set replaceAll to an empty payload.

parameters.name: promo
parameters.description: The promotional price. Set to 'true' in order to retrieve promotional prices

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Basic authorization header. Base 64 encodes the Client ID and Client Secret retrieved in step two of the integration steps.

parameters.name: WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN
parameters.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

parameters.name: WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE
parameters.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

parameters.name: WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID
parameters.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

requestBody.description: The request body consists of a Feed file attached to the request.

offerId.description: This is applicable only for promotions

replaceAll.description: This is applicable only for promotions

effectiveDate.description: This is applicable only for promotions

expirationDate.description: This is applicable only for promotions

promoId.description: This is applicable only for promotions

processMode.description: This is applicable only for promotions

currentPriceType.description: This is applicable only for both promotions and price

comparisonPriceType.description: This is applicable only for promotions

comparisonPrice.description: This is applicable only for promotions

priceDisplayCodes.description: Represent promo placement. This is applicable only for promotions

sku.description: An arbitrary alphanumeric unique ID, specified by the seller, which identifies each item.

message.description: A message of acknowledgement for a price update

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<ns2:ItemPriceResponse xmlns:ns2="http://walmart.com/">
    <ns2:mart>WALMART_US</ns2:mart>
    <ns2:sku>97964_KFTest</ns2:sku>
    <ns2:message>Thank you. Your price has been updated. Please allow up to five minutes for this change to be reflected on the site.</ns2:message>
</ns2:ItemPriceResponse>

sku.description: An arbitrary alphanumeric unique ID, specified by the seller, which identifies each item.

message.description: A message of acknowledgement for a price update

ItemPriceResponse.message: Thank you. Your price has been updated. Please allow up to five minutes for this change to be reflected on the site.
